experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Led development of scalable web applications using React.js and Next.js, delivering responsive, dynamic interfaces for complex business workflows and customer-facing platforms.

Architected and implemented backend services in Python (FastAPI, Django) and Node.js, integrating AI-driven solutions including LLMs and NLP models to automate content personalization and predictive decision-making.
Designed and optimized PostgreSQL and MongoDB schemas and queries for high-volume transactional and analytical workloads.
Implemented comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using Jest, Supertest, and PyTest, reducing production issues by over 35%.
Enhanced application performance through profiling, caching strategies, and CDN optimization, reducing page load times and API response latency by 40%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including product, design, and data science to define API contracts, streamline data pipelines, and ensure cohesive integration of AI models and services.
Integrated external APIs and third-party services for analytics, notifications, and operational insights, enabling predictive decision-making.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and contributed to CI/CD pipeline improvements, fostering best practices in version control, automated testing, and deployment workflows.
